definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: Unreinforced, Super Tough polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 注坯模型的未加強，超級堅韌聚丁烯對苯二酸鹽樹脂。

sentences.english: The intermediate of reaction is monoethyl maleate.
sentences.chinese: 順丁烯二酸乙酯爲反應中間產物。

sentences.english: In 2003, our country demand quantity of PIB was about 40 thousand tons.
sentences.chinese: 2003年，我國聚異丁烯的表觀需求量約爲4萬噸。

sentences.english: Gas chromatography was used to analyze the residue of butene-fipronil in rice.
sentences.chinese: 研究並建立丁烯氟蟲腈在大米中殘留分析方法。

sentences.english: Plates, sheets, coils of polyisobutylene with man-made felt.
sentences.chinese: 聚異丁烯爲基本成分的附有人造毛氈的板，片，卷材。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to extend the resource of isobutene by dehydroge…
sentences.chinese: 因此，通過異丁烷脫氫擴大異丁烯的來源是必要的。

sentences.english: The AC noise will not affect capacitor's other performances. Mucilaginous polyisobutylene can absorb AC noise.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用粘稠的聚異丁烯浸漬劑來吸收交流聲。

sentences.english: Propylene and butylene yields increase with low hydrogen transfer reaction.
sentences.chinese: 氫轉移反應越低，丙烯及丁烯等烯烴選擇性越高。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to extend the resource of isobutene by dehydrogenation of butanes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，通過異丁烷脫氫擴大異丁烯的來源是必要的。

sentences.english: The intrinsic kinetic model of IB oligomerization was set up by study of reaction mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 通過機理分析建立了異丁烯齊聚動力學模型。

sentences.english: A multiple emulsion structure was observed at the boundary between the corn syrup domains and the rest of the matrix.
sentences.chinese: 在聚丁烯和玉米漿的界面觀察到複合乳化結構。
